newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: PDCP to issue 1 bln-peso convertible shrs.
newsitem.headline: PDCP to issue 1 bln-peso convertible shrs.

text.p: PDCP Development Bank said on Thursday its board approved the issue of one billion pesos' worth of convertible preferred shares.
The proceeds of the issue will fund lending operations, computerisation, and refurbishing of branch offices, it said.

The preferred stock issue will be offered to shareholders of record as of September 18, 1996. This issue is convertible to common shares after two years and would have to be redeemed by PDCP after five years.
PDCP said it has appointed Dharmala Capital Investment and Trust Co as issue manager and lead underwriter of the issue.
PDCP is the banking affiliate of diversified firm Metro Pacific Corp.
